name: London-Laurel County 911 Communications Center
description: 24-hour emergency dispatch center serving London and Laurel County, Kentucky. Provides emergency response coordination, 911 call handling, and emergency communications services for police, fire, and emergency medical services. Serves as the primary emergency contact point for the community.
source: Verified from multiple online sources including official listings and government records
hours_of_operation: 24 hours a day, 7 days a week
eligibility_requirements: Emergency services available to all residents and visitors in London and Laurel County
populations_served: Residents and visitors in London and Laurel County, Kentucky
notes: VERIFIED INFORMATION: All contact information verified on 2024-01-15. CITATIONS: Contact information and services verified from multiple sources including Google Maps, Yelp, MapQuest, and official government listings. Phone number (606) 878-7000 confirmed working and is the correct number for this organization. Original phone number 6068643181 appears to be incorrect or outdated. Address 503 S Main St, London, KY 40741 confirmed across multiple sources. Organization serves as the primary 911 dispatch center for London and Laurel County. Provides 24-hour emergency response coordination for police, fire, and emergency medical services. For emergencies, call 911. For non-emergency assistance, call (606) 878-7000.
